name: Spirit Shifter
description:
At the heart of an enchanting world, a little polymorphic creature seeks its true path. Its makes its own way, deforming it-self, exploring every corner of a mysterious maze filled with puzzles to discover its hidden identity.  

Credits:

Background Music

- All the tea in china made by Shane Ivers

- Imperial china cinematic made by Silverman Sound Studio

Sound Effects

- Ringing bells made by InspectorJ Magic

- Click made by Flechabr

- Door made by supersplat1

- Stone made by breviceps

- Lock made by InspectorJ
